properties.Title: NATO Headquarters
properties.Desc: My six months internship program at the NATO Headquarters has evolved into a 2,5 years journey, which I enjoyed every second of it! I had the chance to get to know incredible people working cutting edge defence technology projects in a multinational civil-military joint environment.

properties.Title: ''It doesn't take an army! It takes a few good people.''
properties.Desc:
This was my former boss' motto and the exact definition of my team at Solvoyo. As the COO of Solvoyo, Nilufer has always been a great mentor and encouraged me to push my limits and grow in multiple domains.
After joining NATO, I slightly adjusted the 'It does not take an army...' motto though. Still, it does not take an army. But it takes thirty of them...
